sections.title: PERSONAL
body: My name is Arthur, I'm 36 and currently living in São Paulo/Brazil. I'm married and a proud pet father (picture with my baby Hallelujah).

sections.title: PROFISSIONAL
body: I'm a JavaScript/TypeScript fullstack developer with a degree in System Analysis and Development from FATEC - São Caetano do Sul. I started my career around 2019, specializing in React, React Native and NodeJS.

I'm an expert in the currently most popular React, React Native and Node frameworks (NextJS, Expo and NestJS), and possess a strong understanding of cloud technologies (AWS, Firebase, Harness, and Heroku), as well as experience with various databases (Microsoft SQL, MongoDB, Postgres, Redis, DynamoDB, RDS).
Since December/2021 I'm working as a fullstack developer at

sections.title: HOBBIES
body: Video Game (Fanboy of Nintendo and FROMSoftware)
